Text: WOW! I totally remembered when the NOW compilations started when my parents bought Now 1 at Costco!! I played the shit out of that one and we bought Now 2. I sort of fell out of the loop after about 5 or 6. Thanks for uploading this! These compilations are sooo hard to find!!!! PROPS!
thedertyone if you did your chores like you were asked they would probably give you your allowance back to buy more cds from costco
